channel.title: Resumes on Polina Shopina
channel.description: Recent content in Resumes on Polina Shopina

item.title: About Me
item.description: Hi! I’m Polina, a recent Engineering Physics graduate from the University of British Columbia. My interests include robotics, aerospace engineering, physics, and machine learning. I’ve worked on a number of cool projects, which you can check out here. My most recent project is an automated ballistic interceptor. Besides engineering, I enjoy hiking, reading and film photography.
